Package cat.proven.currencyconverter.model

Class CurrencyConverter

java.lang.Object
cat.proven.currencyconverter.model.CurrencyConverter
public class CurrencyConverter extends Object
Stores currency changes and performs conversions

  • Method Details

    • getCurrencies

      public Set<String> getCurrencies()
      gets all currency names
      Returns:
      a Set with all currency names

    • getCurrencyChange

      public Double getCurrencyChange(String currency) throws CurrencyNotFoundException
      gets value (change) of given currency
      Parameters:
      currency - the currency name to search
      Returns:
      the value of the change of that currency
      Throws:
      CurrencyNotFoundException - if currency not found

    • change

      public Double change(String cSource, String cTarget, Double value) throws CurrencyNotFoundException
      calculates value of change from 'cSource' currency to 'cTarget'
      Parameters:
      cSource - the source currency
      cTarget - the target currency
      value - the amount in 'cSource' currency to change
      Returns:
      the calculated change
      Throws:
      CurrencyNotFoundException - if some currency is not found

    • addCurrency

      public boolean addCurrency(String name, Double value)
      adds a new currency and its value to the map
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the currency
      value - the value of the currency
      Returns:
      true if successfully added, false otherwise

    • modifyCurrency

      public boolean modifyCurrency(String name, Double value) throws CurrencyNotFoundException
      modifies a currency value
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the currency
      value - the value of the currency
      Returns:
      true if successfully modified, false otherwise
      Throws:
      CurrencyNotFoundException - if currency name is not found

    • removeCurrency

      public boolean removeCurrency(String name) throws CurrencyNotFoundException
      removes a currency and its value from the map
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the currency
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      CurrencyNotFoundException - if currency name is not found
